Hello,

I'm atm using rawr to determinate what gear would be good for me, but I really don't care about the threat values!

Unfortunatly you can only choose ALL sorting values or ONLY ONE.

I want to sort on mitigation AND survivabily but NOT threat!

 

I don't thikn this is posible atm right?

1) Which model

2) Some models allow you to set teh value of threat to 0 or near zero so it's almost accomplishing what you want

3) Why do you not care about threat? Threat is an essential part of tanking. If you can't push out enough threat to keep up with DPS'rs (especially warlocks and Arms/Fury Warriors) then the gear doesn't do you a whole lot of survivability work cuz the boss will want to hit them instead.

Druid Bear model, how do I set the valie of threat to 0 ?

and I do not care about threat cause I have enough.

Look at the options screen.

There are a few situations where you don't care about threat (tanking Steelbreaker, tanking Kologarn body in most cases, tanking Freya, etc). Be very careful of how much you think you have "enough" threat. It's easy to gear/gem yourself to completely ignore it, and suddenly find yourself being caught by DPS all of a sudden (aka, all PvP gear, and stam gems might not be the best way to go).
